mapper.insert: insert into ORDERS (member_id, phone, name, address, email, price, date) values( "${memberId}", "${phone}", "${name}", "${address}", "${email}", ${price}, "${date}")
insert into ORDER_ITEMS (order_id, name, price, quantity) values( ${id}, "${item.name}", ${item.price}, ${item.quantity} )
mapper.select: select name, price, quantity from ORDER_ITEMS where order_id = ${id}

select m.id as "memberId", o.id as "orderId", oi.name, oi.price as "unitPrice", oi.quantity, o.`date` from ORDERS as o left join ORDER_ITEMS as oi on o.id = oi.order_id left join MEMBERS as m on m.id = o.member_id where m.id = ${id}
